text: Amazonas may refer to: * Amazon River, known as Amazonas in Spanish and Portuguese ==Places== *Amazonas (Brazilian state), Brazil *Amazonas Department, Colombia *Department of Amazonas, Peru *Amazonas (Venezuelan state), Venezuela ==Other uses== *Massacre in Dinosaur Valley, a 1985 cannibal film also known as Amazonas ==See also== *Amazon (disambiguation) *Amazon basin *Amazon rainforest *Amazonas Province (disambiguation) *Amazonas State (disambiguation)
title: Amazonas
